name: EHB Technologies Development Roadmap
description: This roadmap outlines the phases and milestones for developing the EHB Technology Stack through 2025.

phases.name: Phase 1: Foundation and Core Development
phases.description: Establish the fundamental architecture and core services of the EHB platform.

tasks.name: Develop ModuleIntegrationService for cross-module communication
Create CompanyInfoService for centralized company data
Implement API routes and proxy endpoints for frontend-backend communication
Set up WebSocket notification system
Implement JWT-based authentication with role-based access
Develop Database schema and ORM integration

phases.name: Phase 2: Service Development and Integration
phases.description: Develop and integrate the main service modules of the EHB ecosystem.

tasks.name: Develop TrustyWallet core blockchain functionality
Implement GoSellr E-commerce module with buyer and seller interfaces
Create departmental APIs and dashboard interfaces
Integrate third-party services (payment gateways, identity verification)
Develop drag-and-drop dashboard customization
Implement advanced analytics and reporting system

phases.name: Phase 3: AI Integration and Enhancement
phases.description: Integrate AI capabilities and enhance the existing services with intelligence features.

tasks.name: Develop AI Assistant integration with OpenAI/Claude
Implement contextual help system powered by AI
Create AI-powered data analysis and visualization
Develop predictive analytics for business intelligence
Implement AI-driven transaction monitoring and fraud detection
Develop AI feedback mechanism for continuous improvement

phases.name: Phase 4: Advanced Features and Optimization
phases.description: Add advanced features and optimize the platform for performance and scalability.

tasks.name: Implement distributed blockchain consensus mechanism
Develop smart contract automation for business processes
Create advanced permission and governance system
Implement multi-region deployment and data sovereignty
Develop enterprise-grade backup and disaster recovery
Optimize system performance across all modules

key_milestones.name: MVP Launch
key_milestones.description: Launch of the Minimum Viable Product with core functionality

key_milestones.name: Beta Release
key_milestones.description: Beta release with all primary services integrated

key_milestones.name: 1.0 Release
key_milestones.description: First stable release with complete feature set
